credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Fork
description: Four curved tines, curved shoulders and long baluster neck, Plain oval ferrule. Flaring ivory handle, painted green, octagonal in section, carved with vertical lines. Small silver appliques, floral and leaf-shaped, on front and back. Silver mount on top of handle showing a lion.
name: Fork
